page.title: 12Home Life Self-Sufficiency.
page.content: Mr and Mrs Sammons live at Mayfield and have 2 acres of land.The family suffered from allergies and asthma. They found goats milk very good for health. They now have 10 nanny goats,1 billy and 16 kids.The flock produces 60 gals of milk weekly.Goats cheese,yoghurt and butter are sold at the door and to health food shops. In addition sheep are kept and a very productive vegetable plot. Mr Sammons is a painter and decorator so Mrs Sammons looks after the animals helped by the children. The house is built on the site of the old village well.
